GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
iommu/arm-smmu-v3-sva: Fix mm use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit 9aa215450888cf29af0c479e14a712dc6b0c506c, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 32784a9562fb0518b12e9797ee2aec52214adf6f. For more details please see the references link.
